text: This is not for public to walk in to the immigration checkpoint from here. It's more for  the immigration staff. You can only access by taking CausewayLink buses to the checkpoint.

To my disappointment the processing of immigration entries at Singapore for foreign visitors were applauding. The queue wait time was over 2hours at Tuas check point for bus passengers crossing from Malaysia.

On the other hand, entry point for Singaporean passport holders was fast. My count was about 5 Singaporeans over the two hours.

If only more counters could have been opened up to speed up visitorsâ€™ lanes. It would helped also if a couple of local counters were used as well.
Also please consider fast lanes for seniors visitors, parents with young children.

Some considerations for Singapore immigration.
